allowances.none_found_filtered: No allowances found for the selected filters

info.description: Because signatures are not stored on the blockchain, there is no way for Revoke.cash to check if you actually signed any signatures. So this page contains a list of <0>potential</0> signatures. <1>You only need to cancel these signatures if you are sure that you signed one on a phishing website</1>. After cancelling a signature, the entry will remain in the list for next time.

marketplaces.none_found: No marketplaces found for this chain.
marketplaces.title: Marketplace Signatures

permit.none_found: No tokens with Permit support found.
permit.title: Permit Signatures

tooltips.acknowledge_signature_notice: Please acknowledge the notice before checking your signatures.
tooltips.connect_wallet: Please connect your wallet to continue
tooltips.connected_account: You can only perform actions for the connected account
tooltips.marketplace_listings: This will cancel all current listings and offers on {{marketplace}}.
tooltips.marketplace_signatures: Once approved, marketplaces are able to move assets on your behalf. Bad actors exploit these approvals to create zero-priced listings on third party websites. Cancel these if you signed a marketplace signature on a phishing website.
tooltips.permit_signatures: Permit Signatures are used to approve allowances without sending a transaction. Cancel these if you signed a Permit signature on a phishing website.
tooltips.switch_chain: Please switch your connected chain to <0>{{chainName}}</0> inside your wallet to continue
